com.jwetherell.augmented_reality.ui.objects

Class PaintableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jwetherell.augmented_reality.ui.objects.PaintableObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaintableBox, PaintableBoxedText, PaintableCircle, PaintableGps, PaintableIcon, PaintableLine, PaintablePoint, PaintablePosition, PaintableRadarPoints, PaintableText

    public abstract class PaintableObject
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class provides many methods paint objects on a given Canvas.
    Author:
    Justin Wetherell

      • paintLine

        public void paintLine(Canvas canvas,
             float x1,
             float y1,
             float x2,
             float y2)
        Paint a line on the given Canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to paint on.
        x1 - Beginning X to draw line.
        y1 - Beginning Y to draw line.
        x2 - Ending X to draw line.
        y2 - Ending Y to draw line.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if Canvas is NULL.

        height - Height of the rectangle.

        radius - Radius of the circle.

             float x,
             float y,
             java.lang.String text)
        Paint text on the given Canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to paint on.
        x - X Coordinate of the text.
        y - Y coordinate of the text.
        text - String to paint on the Canvas.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if Canvas or String param is NULL.

      • paintObj

        public void paintObj(Canvas canvas,
            PaintableObject obj,
            float x,
            float y,
            float rotation,
            float scale)
        Paint generic object on the Canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to paint on.
        obj - Object to paint on the Canvas.
        x - X coordinate of the object.
        y - Y coordinate of the object.
        rotation - Rotation of the object.
        scale - Scale of the object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if Canvas or Object is NULL.

        public void paintPath(Canvas canvas,
             Path path,
             float x,
             float y,
             float width,
             float height,
             float rotation,
             float scale)
        Paint path on the given Canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to paint on.
        path - Path to paint on the Canvas.
        x - X coordinate of the path.
        y - Y coordinate of the path.
        width - Width of the path.
        height - Height of the path.
        rotation - Rotation of the path.
        scale - Scale of the path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if Canvas or Path is NULL.
